name: GetBusinessServiceImpacts
description:
Retrieve top business services by impact with status included.

Fetch a list of top-level business services sorted by highest impact, including status. Useful for identifying the most affected services up to a limit of 200. Use the 'ids[]' parameter to get information on specific services. Requires 'services.read' OAuth scope.

parameters.name: accept_version_header
parameters.description: Specify the version of the API to use in the `Accept` header for versioning purposes.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: include_additional_fields
parameters.description: Specify additional fields to include, like highest impacting priority or total impacted count. Options: 'services.highest_impacting_priority', 'total_impacted_count'.

value_schema.description: Provides access to additional fields such as highest priority per business service and total impacted count

parameters.name: specific_business_service_ids
parameters.description: List of specific Business Service IDs to retrieve impact information for. Use this to target particular services.
